field.name: delay
field.label: Delay
field.description: The time one slide stays on the screen in Milliseconds

field.name: shuffle
field.label: Shuffle Mode
field.description: Turn Shuffle Mode on and off! Will be randomized only once at the start.

field.name: lazy_load
field.label: Lazy Load
field.description: The lazy load means that the images will be loaded by demand, it speeds the loading of the slider.

field.name: use_wpml
field.label: Use Multi Language (WPML)
field.description: Use the slide as mutli language - show multi language controls across the slider. This available only when wpml plugin exists

field.name: enable_static_layers
field.label: Enable Static Layers
field.description: This will enable the static layerss, giving you the option to have layers that stay on the slider on more then one slide

field.name: next_slide_on_window_focus
field.label: Next Slide on Focus
field.description: Enabling this will move to the next slide if the Slider gets into focus if the user switched between tabs

field.name: start_js_after_delay
field.label: Initialization Delay
field.description: Sets a delay before the Slider gets initialized

field.name: stop_slider
field.label: Stop Slider
field.description: On / Off to stop slider after some amount of loops / slides

field.name: stop_after_loops
field.label: Stop After Loops
field.description: Stop the slider after certain amount of loops. 0 related to the first loop.

field.name: stop_at_slide
field.label: Stop At Slide
field.description: Stop the slider at the given slide

field.name: show_timerbar
field.label: Show Progressbar
field.description: Show the top running progressbar

field.name: loop_slide
field.label: Loop Single Slide
field.description: If only one Slide is in the Slider, you can choose wether the Slide should loop or if it should stop.

field.name: position
field.label: Position on the page
field.description: The position of the slider on the page, (float:left, float:right, margin:0px auto;)

field.name: margin_top
field.label: Margin Top
field.description: The top margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_bottom
field.label: Margin Bottom
field.description: The bottom margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_left
field.label: Margin Left
field.description: The left margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_right
field.label: Margin Right
field.description: The right margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: shadow_type
field.label: Shadow Type
field.description: The Shadow display underneath the banner. The shadow apply to fixed and responsive modes only, the full width slider don't have a shadow.

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding (border)
field.description: The wrapper div padding, if it has value, then together with background color it it will make border around the slider.

field.name: backround_image_options
field.label: Background Image Options (best used with transparent slides)

field.name: background_color
field.label: Background color
field.description: Slider wrapper div background color, for transparent slider, leave empty.

field.name: background_dotted_overlay
field.label: Dotted Overlay Size
field.description: Show a dotted overlay on the whole slider, choose width of dots

field.name: show_background_image
field.label: Show Background Image
field.description: yes / no to put background image to the main slider wrapper.

field.name: background_image
field.label: Background Image Url
field.description: The background image that will be on the slider wrapper. Will be shown at slider preloading.

field.name: bg_fit
field.label: Background Fit
field.description: How the background will be fitted into the Slider

field.name: bg_repeat
field.label: Background Repeat
field.description: How the background will be repeated into the Slider

field.name: bg_position
field.label: Background Position
field.description: How the background will be positioned into the Slider

field.name: stop_on_hover
field.label: Stop On Hover
field.description: Stop the Timer when hovering the slider

field.name: keyboard_navigation
field.label: Keyboard Navigation
field.description: Allow/disallow to navigate the slider with keyboard

field.name: navigation_style
field.label: Navigation Style
field.description: Look of the navigation bullets ** If you choose navbar, we recommend to choose Navigation Arrows to nexttobullets

field.name: navigaion_type
field.label: Bullet Type
field.description: Display type of the navigation bar (Default:none

field.name: navigation_arrows
field.label: Navigation Arrows
field.description: Display position of the Navigation Arrows (** By navigation Type Thumb arrows always centered or none visible)

field.name: navigaion_always_on
field.label: Always Show Navigation
field.description: Always show the navigation and the thumbnails.

field.name: hide_thumbs
field.label: Hide Navigation After
field.description: Time after that the Navigation and the Thumbs will be hidden(Default: 200 ms)

field.name: navigaion_align_hor
field.label: Navigation Horizontal Align
field.description: Horizontal Align of Bullets / Thumbnails

field.name: navigaion_align_vert
field.label: Navigation Vertical Align
field.description: Vertical Align of Bullets / Thumbnails

field.name: navigaion_offset_hor
field.label: Navigation Horizontal Offset
field.description: Offset from current Horizontal position of Bullets / Thumbnails negative and positive direction

field.name: navigaion_offset_vert
field.label: Navigation Vertical Offset
field.description: Offset from current Vertical position of Bullets / Thumbnails negative and positive direction

field.name: leftarrow_align_hor
field.label: Left Arrow Horizontal Align
field.description: Horizontal Align of left Arrow (only if arrow is not next to bullets)

field.name: leftarrow_align_vert
field.label: Left Arrow Vertical Align
field.description: Vertical Align of left Arrow (only if arrow is not next to bullets)

field.name: leftarrow_offset_hor
field.label: Left Arrow Horizontal Offset
field.description: Offset from current Horizontal position of of left Arrow negative and positive direction

field.name: leftarrow_offset_vert
field.label: Left Arrow Vertical Offset
field.description: Offset from current Vertical position of of left Arrow negative and positive direction

field.name: rightarrow_align_hor
field.label: Right Arrow Horizontal Align
field.description: Horizontal Align of right Arrow (only if arrow is not next to bullets)

field.name: rightarrow_align_vert
field.label: Right Arrow Vertical Align
field.description: Vertical Align of right Arrow (only if arrow is not next to bullets)

field.name: rightarrow_offset_hor
field.label: Right Arrow Horizontal Offset
field.description: Offset from current Horizontal position of of right Arrow negative and positive direction

field.name: rightarrow_offset_vert
field.label: Right Arrow Vertical Offset
field.description: Offset from current Vertical position of of right Arrow negative and positive direction

field.name: thumb_width
field.label: Thumb Width
field.description: The basic Width of one Thumbnail (only if thumb is selected)

field.name: thumb_height
field.label: Thumb Height
field.description: the basic Height of one Thumbnail (only if thumb is selected)

field.name: thumb_amount
field.label: Thumb Amount
field.description: the amount of the Thumbs visible same time (only if thumb is selected)

field.name: use_spinner
field.label: Choose Spinner
field.description: Select a Spinner for your Slider

field.name: spinner_color
field.label: Spinner Color
field.description: The Color the Spinner will be shown in

field.name: use_parallax
field.label: Enable Parallax
field.description: Enabling this, will give you new options in the slides to create a unique parallax effect

field.name: disable_parallax_mobile
field.label: Disable on Mobile
field.description: If set to on, parallax will be disabled on mobile devices to save performance

field.name: parallax_type
field.label: Type
field.description: Defines on what input type the parallax should react to

field.name: parallax_bg_freeze
field.label: BG Freeze
field.description: Setting this to on will freeze the background so that it is not affected by the parallax effect

field.name: parallax_level_1
field.label: Level Depth 1
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_2
field.label: Level Depth 2
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_3
field.label: Level Depth 3
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_4
field.label: Level Depth 4
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_5
field.label: Level Depth 5
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_6
field.label: Level Depth 6
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_7
field.label: Level Depth 7
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_8
field.label: Level Depth 8
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_9
field.label: Level Depth 9
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: parallax_level_10
field.label: Level Depth 10
field.description: Defines a level that can be used in Slide Editor for this Slider

field.name: touchenabled
field.label: Touch Enabled
field.description: Enable Swipe Function on touch devices

field.name: swipe_velocity
field.label: Swipe Treshhold (0 - 200)
field.description: Defines the sensibility of gestures. Smaller values mean a higher sensibility

field.name: swipe_min_touches
field.label: Swipe Min Finger
field.description: Defines how many fingers are needed minimum for swiping

field.name: drag_block_vertical
field.label: Drag Block Vertical
field.description: Scroll below slider on vertical swipe

field.name: disable_on_mobile
field.label: Disable Slider on Mobile
field.description: If this is enabled, the slider will not be loaded on mobile devices.

field.name: disable_kenburns_on_mobile
field.label: Disable KenBurn On Mobile
field.description: This will disable KenBurns on mobile devices to save performance

field.name: hide_slider_under
field.label: Hide Slider Under Width
field.description: Hide the slider under some slider width. Works only in Responsive Style. Not available for Fullwidth.

field.name: hide_defined_layers_under
field.label: Hide Defined Layers Under Width
field.description: Hide some defined layers in the layer properties under some slider width.

field.name: hide_all_layers_under
field.label: Hide All Layers Under Width
field.description: Hide all layers under some slider width

field.name: hide_arrows_on_mobile
field.label: Hide Arrows on Mobile
field.description: Show/Hide the Navigation Arrows on Mobile Devices

field.name: hide_bullets_on_mobile
field.label: Hide Bullets on Mobile
field.description: Show/Hide the Navigation Bullets on Mobile Devices

field.name: hide_thumbs_on_mobile
field.label: Hide Thumbnails on Mobile
field.description: Show/Hide the Thumbnails on Mobile Devices

field.name: hide_thumbs_under_resolution
field.label: Hide Thumbs Under Width
field.description: Hide the Thumbnails on Mobile Devices under some slider width

field.name: hide_thumbs_delay_mobile
field.label: Hide Mobile Nav After
field.description: Time after that the Navigation and the Thumbs will be hidden on mobile devices(Default: 1500 ms)

field.name: start_with_slide
field.label: Start With Slide
field.description: Change it if you want to start from a different slide then 1

field.name: first_transition_active
field.label: First Transition Active
field.description: If active, it will overwrite the first slide transition. Use it when you want a special transition for the first slide only.

field.name: first_transition_type
field.label: First Transition Type
field.description: First slide transition type

field.name: first_transition_duration
field.label: First Transition Duration
field.description: First slide transition duration (Default:300, min: 100 max 2000)

field.name: first_transition_slot_amount
field.label: First Transition Slot Amount
field.description: The number of slots or boxes the slide is divided into. If you use boxfade, over 7 slots can be juggy

field.name: simplify_ie8_ios4
field.label: Simplify on IOS4/IE8
field.description: Simplyfies the Slider on IOS4 and IE8

field.name: show_alternative_type
field.label: Use Alternative
field.description: Disables the Slider on the setting you make and shows an alternative image instead

field.name: show_alternate_image
field.label: Alternate Image
field.description: The image that will used as the alternative to the Slider

field.name: reset_transitions
field.label: Reset Transitions
field.description: Resets all Slide Transitions of this Slider to your desired type (if empty, no changes will be made)

option.text: Fade To Left and Fade From Right
Fade To Right and Fade From Left
Fade To Top and Fade From Bottom
Fade To Bottom and Fade From Top
Zoom Out and Fade From Right
Zoom Out and Fade From Left
Zoom Out and Fade From Top
Zoom Out and Fade From Bottom

field.name: reset_transition_duration
field.label: Reset Transition Duration
field.description: Reset all transition durations to choosen number (Default:300, min: 100 max 2000, if 0, no changes will be made)

field.name: jquery_noconflict
field.label: JQuery No Conflict Mode
field.description: Turns on / off jquery noconflict mode. You can play with this option when you have some javascript conflicts.

field.name: js_to_body
field.label: Put JS Includes To Body
field.description: Putting the js to body (in addition to head) is good for fixing some javascript conflicts of type: TypeError: tpj('#rev_slider_1_1').show().revolution is not a function

field.name: output_type
field.label: Output Filters Protection
field.description: Activate a protection against wordpress output filters that adds html blocks to the shortcode output like P and BR

field.name: text_google_deprecated
field.label: This menu point will be deprecated in V5.0. Please use the Punch Fonts Menu

field.name: load_googlefont
field.label: Load Google Font
field.description: yes / no to load google font

field.name: text_google_font
field.label: The google font families to load:

field.name: text_google_font
field.label: Add New

field.name: text_google
field.label: To add more google fonts please read this tutorial
